name: Hermetica USDh
description: USDh is the first Bitcoin-backed, yield-bearing stablecoin on Bitcoin L1 and L2s. USDh consists of BTC coupled with a short perpetual futures position to create a synthetic dollar that is completely outside the fiat banking system. The short perpetual futures position generates up to 25% APY from funding rate payments which are passed on to users that stake USDh. Hermeticaâ€™s mission is to enable global financial freedom.
